hero.headline: Transform Your Business with AI-Powered Websites. Effortlessly.
hero.subHeadline: We.trsfrm helps non-techy businesses and individuals build stunning, personalized websites in minutes, using the power of generative AI. No coding required.

section.title: Key Features
section.subtitle: What We Offer
section.paragraph: We.trsfrm offers a suite of powerful features designed to make website creation a breeze, even if you've never written a line of code.

featuresData.title: AI-Powered Personalization
featuresData.description: Our AI algorithms tailor your website content to your specific needs and target audience, ensuring maximum impact and conversion rates.

featuresData.title: Simple Questionnaire-Based Setup
featuresData.description: Just answer a few simple questions and our AI will generate a complete website, ready to go live in minutes.

featuresData.title: Easy Customization
featuresData.description: Fine-tune your website content and design with our intuitive drag-and-drop interface. No coding skills needed.

featuresData.title: Fast and Reliable
featuresData.description: We leverage cutting-edge technology to ensure your website is fast, secure, and always available.

about.title: About We.trsfrm
about.description: We.trsfrm was founded on the belief that everyone should have access to a beautiful, professional online presence, regardless of their technical skills.  We're committed to leveraging the power of AI to make website creation accessible and affordable for all.

experience.years: New on the scene, but making waves!
experience.title: Driven by Innovation
experience.description: We're a young company with a passion for pushing the boundaries of what's possible with AI.  We're constantly learning and evolving, so we can continue to offer the best possible experience for our users.

callToAction.description: Join We.trsfrm today and experience the future of website creation.

pricing.subtitle: Pricing Plans
pricing.title: Choose the Plan That's Right for You
pricing.paragraph: We offer a range of pricing options to suit every budget and need.

offers: Perfect for trying out the platform
Ideal for small businesses and individuals

testimonial.title: Testimonials
testimonial.subtitle: What Our Users Are Saying
testimonial.paragraph: Don't just take our word for it - see what our satisfied customers have to say about We.trsfrm.

testimonials.name: John Doe
testimonials.content: I was amazed at how easy it was to create a professional website with We.trsfrm.  I'm not tech-savvy at all, but the questionnaire-based setup made it a breeze.  I highly recommend it!

testimonials.name: Jane Smith
testimonials.content: We.trsfrm has been a game-changer for my business.  I now have a beautiful website that perfectly represents my brand, and I didn't have to spend a fortune on a web developer.

testimonials.name: David Lee
testimonials.content: I was skeptical at first, but We.trsfrm exceeded my expectations.  The AI-powered personalization is incredible, and the website looks amazing.  I'm already seeing an increase in leads!

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.content: We.trsfrm has saved me so much time and money.  I can now create landing pages and marketing materials in minutes, without having to rely on our busy design team.

testimonials.name: Michael Brown
testimonials.content: I'm impressed with the speed and reliability of We.trsfrm.  My website is always up and running, and I've never had any issues.  I highly recommend it to any business owner looking for a hassle-free website solution.

sectionTitle.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
sectionTitle.title: Your Questions, Answered
sectionTitle.paragraph: We've compiled a list of our most frequently asked questions to help you learn more about We.trsfrm.

faq.question: What is We.trsfrm?
faq.answer: We.trsfrm is an AI-powered website creation platform that allows non-techy businesses and individuals to build stunning, personalized websites in minutes.

faq.question: How does it work?
faq.answer: Simply answer a few simple questions about your business and our AI will generate a complete website, ready to go live.

faq.question: Do I need any coding skills?
faq.answer: No, you don't need any coding skills to use We.trsfrm.  Our intuitive drag-and-drop interface makes it easy to customize your website content and design.

faq.question: How much does it cost?
faq.answer: We offer a range of pricing options to suit every budget and need, including a free plan.  See our pricing page for more details.

faq.question: Can I customize my website?
faq.answer: Yes, you can customize your website content and design with our intuitive drag-and-drop interface.

faq.question: What kind of websites can I create?
faq.answer: You can create a variety of websites with We.trsfrm, including landing pages, marketing websites, and e-commerce stores.

faq.question: What if I need help?
faq.answer: We offer comprehensive support documentation and a dedicated support team to help you with any questions you may have.

faq.question: Is We.trsfrm secure?
faq.answer: Yes, We.trsfrm is built on a secure platform and we take data privacy very seriously.

sectionTitle.subtitle: Meet the Team
sectionTitle.title: The People Behind We.trsfrm
sectionTitle.paragraph: We're a passionate team of innovators and creators, dedicated to making website creation accessible for everyone.

sectionTitle.subtitle: Get in Touch
sectionTitle.title: Contact Us
sectionTitle.paragraph: We'd love to hear from you!  Whether you have a question, feedback, or just want to say hello, please don't hesitate to reach out.
